Don't worry Frank, David the spirit tech says; "Frank Sumption will be the =

There a=
lways seems to some self proclaimed expert or engineers  that claims 
to kn=
ow all about my circuits and the boxes, and how they can  vastly 
improve i=
t, not one of these clowns ask me a damn thing, most of  the time they 
get=
 everything wrong, make alot of assumptions, make alot  of claims, then 
sl=
ink off back under the rock from which they  came.  Yeah, I am being mean 
=
cuz I am tired of being disrespected by  these jerkfucks. They don't even g=
et 
the concept of raw audio, and that the  box is just one method of many =
for 
doing the same thing. Yet these geniuses  will proclaim how flawed my =

circuits are. 
 
 The paranormal is full of these self proclaimed experts =
and not one  of 
them knows shit! 
 
F-S
